programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers return and put on a holiday pageant for young Thomas while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: The three Landry women finally get answers to questions about the past, present and future; but a discovery will propel them to search for more.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche encounters a former schoolmate who is the only man to ever turn her down.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's new boyfriend Mr. Terrific gets Dorothy a job, but her recommendations get him fired.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: In flashbacks, the housemates reminisce about Mother's Day celebrations.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A battle for the affections of a Cuban cigar mogul ignites a dispute between Blanche and Sophia.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia's roommates, bored with themselves, are unaware of her active daytime life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche encounters a former schoolmate who is the only man to ever turn her down.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Daphne move in together, but their domestic bliss is ruined by a visit from her mother (Millicent Martin) and brother (Anthony LaPaglia).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier gives Daphne's brother the boot from the Crane household, and then takes on a vengeful neighbor.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles prepares the perfect night to propose to Daphne, including hiring chef Wolfgang Puck to prepare a romantic dinner.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is leery when his scheming and scamming ex-brother-in-law rolls into town in a wheelchair claiming he's reformed and found God.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Norm considers spreading malicious gossip about his co-worker to win a promotion.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam panics when a series of coincidental events makes him feel old.

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Shawn and Gus go undercover in a mental hospital to investigate a billionaire accused of murder.

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Juliet's con man father visits, hoping to mend their strained relationship.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's family sets up the lonely doctor with blind dates, including an insecure artist (Allison Janney) and a sexy party girl (Bridgette Wilson-Sampras).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier prepares his son (Trevor Einhorn) for the National Spelling Bee finals.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Frasier and Niles discover a skull at their childhood home, they try to deduce what they imagine to be a murder.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Frasier renews his feud with an upstairs neighbor (Brian Stokes Mitchell), Martin begins dating the neighbor's mother in a ploy to diffuse their rivalry.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: A promising seamstress designs dresses for a charity ball hoping to impress the royal guest, but the dresses -- and a possible romance -- seem destined for disaster.

programme.title: A Harvest Wedding
programme.desc: Sarah Bloom, a highly successful wedding planner, returns to her hometown to plan the season's biggest wedding. Much to Sarah's surprise, the bride's brother happens to be her first love.

programme.title: Dating the Delaneys
programme.desc: Three generations of Delaney women explore the highs and lows of modern-day dating, learning that love and romance can be found at any age -- and sometimes where they least expect it.

programme.title: Falling Together
programme.desc: Natalie tries to bring feuding neighbors together in her new condo building. Her unexpected ally is the building's super who prefers to avoid getting involved.

programme.title: A Royal Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a princess and her bodyguard after her budding romance with an artist fizzles out.

programme.title: Royal Matchmaker
programme.desc: A struggling matchmaker is hired by a king to find his son a suitable wife in time for a national celebration. As the clock ticks toward the deadline, the matchmaker finds him the perfect wife -- only to realize that she's fallen in love with him.

programme.title: The Reluctant Royal
programme.desc: Philadelphia mechanic Johnny learns his estranged father is a duke. The duke surprises him, as do his feelings for advisor Prudence.

programme.title: Sisterhood, Inc
programme.desc: Corporate exec Megan starts a board of directors to improve her younger sister's chaotic life and finds romance with a psych professor who uncovers her tough demeanor.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose competes for St. Olaf's Woman of the Year honors, with a little help of Blanche and Dorothy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia cries foul after being hit with a fly ball at the stadium; Stan tries to sue the ballpark.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia wants to wed Max Weinstock, her husband's partner.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia and Max return from their honeymoon and open a food stand on the boardwalk.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose competes for St. Olaf's Woman of the Year honors, with a little help of Blanche and Dorothy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia cries foul after being hit with a fly ball at the stadium; Stan tries to sue the ballpark.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: While in Boston on business, Frasier reunites with Carla (Rhea Perlman), Cliff (John Ratzenberger) and Norm (George Wendt) from Cheers.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Angry listeners respond when Frasier's syndicated show forces a local radio legend (Bill Hayes) off the air; Daphne helps Martin with a furniture project. Joe Flaherty also guest stars.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba allows Kyra to spend time unsupervised with her boyfriend, but she questions that decision when she learns they broke the rules.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and the rest of the family try to cheer Van up after a knee injury ends his arena-football career.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns that Van has hired a nanny so that he can spend more time goofing off and doing all the things he didn't do before.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean confesses that she has a big crush on her new marriage counselor, and she asks Reba to help her fire him.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: The Garrison Gang comes for their gold with Hope Valley residents in the crosshairs; Angela visits the Schwartzman School and Rosemary uncovers the truth about Ava.

programme.title: Sand Dollar Cove
programme.desc: A real estate developer travels to a quaint seaside town to convince a charming local to sell his beachfront property. As she tries to figure out a way to make the deal work, the undeniable attraction between them continues to grow.

programme.title: Summer Villa
programme.desc: A novelist suffering from writer's block and a chef recovering from a bad review share a French villa for the summer.

programme.title: All Things Valentine
programme.desc: A blogger who experiences terrible luck on Valentine's Day meets a handsome veterinarian. When she finds out that he's the one who's been leaving rude comments about her articles, she begins to question whether her luck has really changed.

programme.title: A Costa Rican Wedding
programme.desc: A clumsy maid of honor gets help from her handsome nemesis when things go awry at her best friend's Costa Rican wedding.

programme.title: The Heiress and the Handyman
programme.desc: After losing her fortune, an heiress moves to a rural farm where she mistakes her handsome neighbor for the handyman. To live up to her family's legacy, he helps her compete.

programme.title: The Reluctant Royal
programme.desc: Philadelphia mechanic Johnny learns his estranged father is a duke. The duke surprises him, as do his feelings for advisor Prudence.
